org.activebpel.rt.bpel
Interface IAeFaultTypeInfo

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeFault
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeActivityThrowValidator.AeFaultTypeInfo, AeFault
public interface IAeFaultTypeInfo

Provides the type info for the fault

Method Summary
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getElementType()
          returns the QName of the element data if the data is an element type
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getFaultName()
          Getter for the fault name
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getMessageType()
          returns the QName of the message if the data is a message type
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getSinglePartElementType()
          returns the QName of the single part element if the data is a message and the message has a single element part.
 boolean hasData()
          Returns true if the fault has element or message data
 boolean hasElementData()
          Returns true if the fault has element data.
 boolean hasMessageData()
          Returns true if the fault contains message data.
